name: apexomni-tradingview-connect
description: Free and self-hosted tool to integrate TradingView strategy alerts and execute automated trading for Apex Pro.

scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm install && tsc && NODE_ENV=production ts-node dist/index.js
scripts.start: npm run build:frontend && npm run start:backend
scripts.start:dev: cd backend && npm install && tsc && NODE_ENV=development tsc-watch --onSuccess "ts-node dist/index.js"
